nmrglue.process.proc_base.zf_size¶

nmrglue.process.proc_base.zf_size(data, size, mid=False)¶

Zero fill to given size

Parameters: * data Array of spectral data. * size Final size of data. * mid Set to True to zero fill in middle of data.
